reference.title: Ejecting metadata (CLI)
reference.shortdesc: Bucket ejection from memory is set with the couchbase-cli tool.

section.title: Bucket ejection policy
section.p: Bucket ejection from memory is set with couchbase-cli tool, either bucket-create or bucket-edit, and the --bucket-eviction-policy parameter.
Policy for how to retain or eject metadata from memory:

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock:
couchbase-cli bucket-create -c HOST:PORT --bucket=BUCKET_NAME \\ --bucket-password=PASSWORD \\ --bucket-eviction-policy=[VALUE] -u ADMIN -p PASSWORD
couchbase-cli bucket-edit -c HOST:PORT --bucket=BUCKET_NAME \\ --bucket-eviction-policy=[VALUE] -u ADMIN -p PASSWORD
section.p: To create a new bucket and set metadata ejection to Value:
To edit a bucket and set metadata ejection to Full:
